title: George's chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1kg lean beef mince', '1 litre tomato juice', '400g cooked kidney beans', '600ml passata or sieved tomatoes', '400g cooked pinto beans', '2 onions, finely diced', '1/2 green pepper, diced', 'pinch cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 or 1 teaspoon salt', '1 and 1/2 teaspoons cumin', '4 tablespoons chilli powder, or to taste']
